summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2729, for the improvement of 5th Avenue from Virginia Street to Denny Way, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line on each side of said streets and avenues, together with the installation of such poles, conduits, wires and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system.
